blog.post.title.1: Kira is joining esh; announcing eshX
blog.post.description.1: We are happy to announce the appointment of Dr. Kira Radinsky as a member of the bank's board of directors and as head of eshX - the new laboratory for next-generation technologies.
blog.post.title.2: KThe Equal Bank Board of Directors
blog.post.description.2: We are happy to announce the completion of the composition of the board of directors of Bank esh Israel (in setup).
